name: Body
description: The Body mixin of the Fetch API represents the body of the response/request, allowing you to declare what its content type is and how it should be handled.

members.name: Body.bodyUsed
members.description: Contains a Boolean that indicates whether the body has been read.

members.name: Body.arrayBuffer()
members.description: Takes a Response stream and reads it to completion. It returns a promise that resolves with anÂ ArrayBuffer.

members.name: Body.blob()
members.description: Takes a Response stream and reads it to completion. It returns a promise that resolves with a Blob.

members.name: Body.formData()
members.description: Takes a Response stream and reads it to completion. It returns a promise that resolves with a FormData object.

members.name: Body.json()
members.description: Takes a Response stream and reads it to completion. It returns a promise that resolves with a JSON object.

members.name: Body.text()
members.description: Takes a Response stream and reads it to completion. It returns a promise that resolves with a USVString (text).
